name: FlatScreen2
description:
An update/overhaul of frdhog's [original FlatScreen mod](https://vtolvr-mods.com/mod/zj7ylyrf/).

**MAKE SURE TO UNINSTALL THE ORIGINAL MOD BEFORE RUNNING THIS ONE!!!**

Changes from original mod:
- can initialize with VR active
- new mouse controls
- avatar body hidden to more easily see cockpit
- HMCS and NVG now work properly
- less likely to require camera resetting
- certain options now save
- various minor bug/QoL fixes

Hold right mouse button to look around, or use **TrackIR.**

Use left click to click buttons, flick levers and toggle doors. You can use the scroll wheel to turn knobs, move levers, and adjust throttle.

You can use [TriquetraInput](https://vtolvr-mods.com/mod/twr27qgs/) to fly with your joystick(s).
**UPDATE TO THAT MOD IS COMING SOON**
